content.raw:
Sorry but I'm unable to see the reasons why someone being upstream/packager at the same time wants to have different paths when installing libraries from source or .debs.

I would say that the patch to support an option for not using GNUInstallDirs is very minimal, if you have a good use case, I don't have major problem to implement it.
